about_the_game:
Cavalry Clash - Gold Chest

Contains items: Unbound Gold Coupons * 6,480, New Server Hero Gift Pack * 40, Advanced Experience Books * 50

(Note: This chest can be purchased multiple times in the game.)

Each New Server Hero Pack can choose one of the following rewards:

Zhao Yun Fragments * 10, Guo Jia Fragments * 10, Lu Bu Fragments * 10, Sun Ce Fragments * 10,

Guan Yu Fragments * 10, Zhang Liao Fragments * 10, Diao Chan Fragments * 10, Sun Shangxiang Fragments * 10.

name: Cavalry Charge - Gold Chest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750ti 4G
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
